select-by-config.name: config.xmega.drivers.usart_xmegae
select-by-config.caption: USART for XMEGA E
select-by-config.info: Driver for the Universal Synchronous and Asynchronous Serial Receiver and Transmitter (USART). Provides functions for configuring and using the USART in RS232 and SPI mode. For XMEGA E parts, the driver can be configured to implement or not the XMEGA E specific features (enhanced selection) or not (standard selection). The standard configuration keeps the drivers interface fully compatible will other XMEGA families, whereas the enhanced configuration allows to acces the USART XMEGA E specific features (start frame detection, variable frame lenght, encoding/decoding).
